name: Proworks Open Toolbox + A9 Sprays 4 Value pack
productName: Proworks Open Toolbox + A9 Sprays 4 Value pack
longDescription: Proworks open toolbox with aerosol bottle holder. Great for keeping your spray cans neatly organized and easily accesible. Dimensions: 40,5 x 27,3 x 17,5 cm Sprays included: (see descriptions below) - 1 x A9 Racing Motocross Chain Lube - 1 x A9 Racing Chain Cleaner - 1 x A9 Racing Brake Cleaner - 1 x A9 Racing Air Filter Oil Spray A9 Racing Motocross Chain Lube is designed to keep your chain fresh in the most extreme conditions that a chain may have to endure; for offroad motocross and enduro. A9 Racing Motocross Chain Lube provides long-term lubrication, which minimizes wear on the chain and sprockets. Features: • Lubricates, prevents rust and corrosion and is also water repellent • Ratio temperatures between -30 ° C to 180 ° C • Manufactured in Germany • Volume: 400 ml A9 Racing Chain Cleaner is a super-efficient chain cleaning spray, developed specifically to clean all types of chains. Features: • Works equally well on O- and X-ring chains • Doesn't dry out and damage the rubber seals • Manufactured in Germany • Volume: 400 ml A9 Racing Brake Cleaner is a powerful cleaning spray that dissolves even the toughest grease and grime. Features: • Quickly and easily removes oil, grease, brake fluid and other contaminants • Suitable for brake discs and pads, metal components, couplings, cable connections etc • Will not harm rubber, plastic or paint. • Volume: 400 ml A9 Racing Air Filter Oil Spray prevents penetration of sand, dust and water and guarantees optimum air permeability. Features: • Excellent adhesion • Usable in temperatures between -30° C to 180° C • Manufactured in Germany • Volume: 400 ml
